meanings.sent1: The bell had a ringing tone.
meanings.sent2: The ringing alarm woke me up.
meanings.sent3: The ringing laughter of the children filled the room.
meanings.sent4: Her ringing voice echoed through the hall.
meanings.sent5: The ringing applause filled the auditorium.

meanings.definition: Surrounding something in a circular shape
meanings.sent1: The ringing fence enclosed the garden.
meanings.sent2: The ringing wreath adorned the door.
meanings.sent3: The ringing ribbon wrapped around the gift.
meanings.sent4: The ringing halo above his head glowed.
meanings.sent5: The ringing circle of friends gathered around.

meanings.definition: A phone call or sound made by a phone
meanings.sent1: I heard the ringing of the phone in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The ringing of the phone startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The ringing of the phone echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The ringing of the phone was music to her ears.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things arranged in a circle or similar shape
meanings.sent1: The ringing of chairs formed a circle in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The ringing of dancers created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent3: The ringing of planets in orbit fascinated the scientist.
meanings.sent4: The ringing of stones arranged in a circle marked the ancient ritual site.
meanings.sent5: The ringing of voices in harmony filled the concert hall.
